title: Swap floating Play-button background music to “Binary Finary 1999” while keeping the same asset path

requirements.summary: Keep the Play-button background music flow unchanged while swapping the bundled track to “Binary Finary 1999”, continuing to reference the exact same audio path.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the floating Play button starts playback of the updated track.
The code continues to reference the exact same audio path: "/assets/audio/background-dance.mp3" (no path changes).
Existing background music behavior remains intact: no autoplay on first visit unless previously opted-in, and the controller still switches from Play to mute/volume controls when playing.
If the audio file cannot be loaded/played, the existing English error message behavior remains visible and the Play button remains available for retry.

file_operations.description: Add a code comment and a small in-file note to document that the background music track has been updated while the audio path string must remain exactly "/assets/audio/background-dance.mp3"; do not change any behavior, user-facing text, or the path literal.

requirements.summary: Bundle the updated audio track at the existing static asset location "/assets/audio/background-dance.mp3" without adding any new playback paths/files.
acceptanceCriteria: The built frontend includes the audio file at the same location that resolves for the browser as "/assets/audio/background-dance.mp3".
No other code changes are required to select the new track (the existing Play button flow continues to work).

file_operations.description: Add the updated bundled MP3 audio content for the requested track (“Binary Finary 1999”) at this exact static path so the browser resolves it as "/assets/audio/background-dance.mp3"; do not introduce any additional audio files or alternate paths for playback.
